title: Seaside (feat. Sonny Zero)
lyrics:
Lyric oftn - Seaside (feat. Sonny Zero)

[Romanization]

Way wind flows right through your hair
Can you smell salt in air from the ocean
And we’re drenched didn’t bring nothing to wear
Can we dip our toes into the seaside
bada sori in the starlight
Your skin is golden with tan lines
I see reflections of sunsets in your eyes

Can we dip our toes into the ocean
Beads of seawater glimmer and dance
Rest our heads in the sand
Waves falling back
We ebb and we flow with the tide
I
Hide in the shade from your shine
Why
Is your presence blinding
Just you and I
Look at an unending horizon

Oh waves they push and pull
As we rest by the coastal shore
Oh feet in ocean floor
You drag me in deeper more
Oh waves they push and pull
As we rest by the coastal shore
Oh feet in ocean floor
You drag me in deeper more

Way wind flows right through your hair
Can you smell salt in air from the ocean
And we’re drenched didn’t bring nothing to wear
Can we dip our toes into the seaside
bada sori in the starlight
Your skin is golden with tan lines
I see reflections of sunsets in your eyes

I think this island life it suits us
Let time pass by, live slow now
Our sun kissed hands they hold on to each other
We wade in the water still
I could spend my whole life like this
And baby in just a couple years we’ll reminisce

‘Cause under the sun
I feel more in love with you
When the ocean waves flow
I sink deeper and deeper in love babe
Starlight on you is the sunbeams
Clouds part for you in the morning
You are my summer day

Oh waves they push and pull
As we rest by the coastal shore
Oh feet in ocean floor
You drag me in deeper more
Oh waves they push and pull
As we rest by the coastal shore
Oh feet in ocean floor
You drag me in deeper more

Way wind flows right through your hair

And we’re drenched didn’t bring nothing to wear
Can we dip our toes into the seaside
bada sori in the starlight
Your skin is golden with tan lines
I see reflections of sunsets in your eyes
